title: Quantity of ice cream consumed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 - 2012 , by age
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Consumption in grams, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is  negative which exists from 4-10_years to 65_years_and_over.
But, the next significant trend is  positive which exists from 1.5-3_years to 4-10_years.
